description:
Prepare yourself for a field in Biomimicry where you can leverage or mimic biological principles to find new and innovative solutions to contemporary problems at ASU. https://asuonline.asu.edu/online-degree-programs/graduate/master-science-biomimicry/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video_paid&utm_content=sh-scishow-video&utm_campaign=-sh_scishow_biomimicry_ms&ecd22=&utm_term=

You can turn all your old cooking scraps into gardening gold, thanks to hard-working microbes. Here's all the science of compost and everything you need to know to get started composting. 

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: A Scientist's Guide to Composting
